fusionlibrary.utils.model_chooserÔÉÅ

Function/functions to help user choose model‚Äôs to run

Functions

get_models(conditions_dict[,¬†fusion_model_dict])

param conditions_dict:

Dictionary containing the conditions to filter the models.

model_importer(fusion_model_dict)

Imports all the fusion models in the fusion_model_dict.
fusionlibrary.utils.model_chooser.get_models(conditions_dict, fusion_model_dict=[{'name': 'Tabular1Unimodal', 'path': 'fusion_models.tabular1_unimodal'}, {'name': 'Tabular2Unimodal', 'path': 'fusion_models.tabular2_unimodal'}, {'name': 'ImgUnimodal', 'path': 'fusion_models.img_unimodal'}, {'name': 'ConcatTabularFeatureMaps', 'path': 'fusion_models.concat_tabular_feature_maps'}, {'name': 'ConcatImageMapsTabularData', 'path': 'fusion_models.concat_img_maps_tabular_data'}, {'name': 'ConcatTabularData', 'path': 'fusion_models.concat_tabular_data'}, {'name': 'ConcatImageMapsTabularMaps', 'path': 'fusion_models.concat_img_maps_tabular_maps'}, {'name': 'TabularChannelWiseMultiAttention', 'path': 'fusion_models.tabular_channelwise_att'}, {'name': 'ImageChannelWiseMultiAttention', 'path': 'fusion_models.img_tab_channelwise_att'}, {'name': 'CrossmodalMultiheadAttention', 'path': 'fusion_models.crossmodal_att'}, {'name': 'TabularCrossmodalMultiheadAttention', 'path': 'fusion_models.tab_crossmodal_att'}, {'name': 'TabularDecision', 'path': 'fusion_models.tabular_decision'}, {'name': 'ImageDecision', 'path': 'fusion_models.img_tab_decision'}, {'name': 'MCVAE_tab', 'path': 'fusion_models.mcvae_tab'}, {'name': 'ConcatImgLatentTabDoubleTrain', 'path': 'fusion_models.concat_img_latent_tab_doubletrain'}, {'name': 'ConcatImgLatentTabDoubleLoss', 'path': 'fusion_models.concat_img_latent_tab_doubleloss'}, {'name': 'EdgeCorrGNN', 'path': 'fusion_models.edge_corr_gnn'}, {'name': 'DAETabImgMaps', 'path': 'fusion_models.denoise_tab_img_maps'}])[source]ÔÉÅ
Parameters:

conditions_dict (dict) ‚Äì

Dictionary containing the conditions to filter the models. Structure: {feature1: condition, feature2: condition, ‚Ä¶}

or {feature1: [condition1, condition2, ‚Ä¶], feature2: [condition1, ‚Ä¶], ‚Ä¶}

Accepted features and accepted conditions:

  • ‚Äùfusion_type‚Äù: ‚ÄúUni-modal‚Äù, ‚Äúoperation‚Äù, ‚Äúattention‚Äù, ‚Äúsubspace‚Äù, ‚Äúgraph‚Äù, or ‚Äúall‚Äù

  • ‚Äùmodality_type‚Äù: ‚Äútabular1‚Äù, ‚Äútabular2‚Äù, ‚Äúimg‚Äù, ‚Äúboth_tab‚Äù, ‚Äútab_img‚Äù, or ‚Äúall‚Äù

  • ‚Äùmethod_name‚Äù: any method name currently implemented (e.g. ‚ÄúTabular decision‚Äù), or ‚Äúall‚Äù

  • ‚Äùclass_name‚Äù: any model name currently implemented (e.g. ‚ÄúTabularDecision‚Äù), or ‚Äúall‚Äù

Example: To get all the models that are uni-modal and attention-based, the dictionary would be:

conditions_dict = {
    "fusion_type": ["Uni-modal", "operation"],
    "modality_type": "all",
    }

fusion_model_dictlist
List of dictionaries containing the fusion models‚Äô names and paths. Default is

fusion_model_dict. Defined inside fusionlibrary.utils.model_chooser.py.

Returns:

filtered_models ‚Äì Dataframe containing the filtered models. Column names:

  • ‚Äùmethod_name‚Äù: name of the model (e.g. ‚ÄúTabular decision‚Äù)

  • ‚Äùfusion_type‚Äù: type of fusion (e.g. ‚Äúoperation‚Äù)

  • ‚Äùmodality_type‚Äù: type of modality (e.g. ‚Äúboth_tab‚Äù)

  • ‚Äùclass_name‚Äù: name of the class (e.g. ‚ÄúTabularDecision‚Äù)

  • ‚Äùmethod_path‚Äù: path to the method‚Äôs py file (e.g. ‚Äúfusionlibrary.fusion_models.tabular_decision‚Äù)

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

fusionlibrary.utils.model_chooser.model_importer(fusion_model_dict)[source]ÔÉÅ
